name: opeqsn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wceq(cop(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, csn(c0))))

comment: Equivalence for an ordered pair equal to a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2008.) (Revised by AV, 15-Jul-2022.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
